languages.text: "Еретики и ксеносы получат по заслугам... ведь так?"
"The heretics and xenos will get what they deserve... right?"
languages.original_text: "Еретики и ксеносы получат по заслугам... ведь так?"

traits.locale_text: "Heretics and xenos will get what they deserve... right?"
"The heretics and xenos will get what they deserve... right?"
"The heretics and xenos will get what they deserve... right?"
"The heretics and xenos will get what they deserve... right?"

languages.text: 「邪教徒と異種族どもは、相応の報いを受ける…のだろう？」
languages.original_text: "The heretics and xenos will get what they deserve... right?"

traits.locale_text: 「邪教徒と異種族どもは、相応の報いを受ける…のだろう？」

languages.text: « Les hérétiques et les xénos vont avoir ce qu'ils méritent... pas vrai ? »
languages.original_text: "The heretics and xenos will get what they deserve... right?"

traits.locale_text: « Les hérétiques et les xénos vont avoir ce qu'ils méritent... pas vrai ? »

languages.text: “异端分子和异形必将得到报应……是吧？”
languages.original_text: "The heretics and xenos will get what they deserve... right?"

traits.locale_text: “异端分子和异形必将得到报应……是吧？”

languages.text: «Los herejes y los xenos recibirán lo que se merecen... ¿verdad?».
languages.original_text: "The heretics and xenos will get what they deserve... right?"

traits.locale_text: «Los herejes y los xenos recibirán lo que se merecen... ¿verdad?».

languages.text: "Die Ketzer und Xenos bekommen, was sie verdienen ... nicht wahr?"
languages.original_text: "The heretics and xenos will get what they deserve... right?"

traits.locale_text: "Die Ketzer und Xenos bekommen, was sie verdienen ... nicht wahr?"

languages.text: "Kâfirler ve zenolar hak ettiklerini bulacak... Değil mi?"
languages.original_text: "The heretics and xenos will get what they deserve... right?"

traits.locale_text: "Kâfirler ve zenolar hak ettiklerini bulacak... Değil mi?"
